name: Ravenfolk Scout
description: The Ravenfolk Scout resembles a humanoid figure with raven features, excelling in stealth and employing versatile tactics in ambush situations.
memorable: Notable for its ability to mimic sounds, providing tactical advantages and deceptive maneuvers in combat.
goals: Primarily acts as a reconnaissance and ambush specialist, gathering information and making surprise attacks.
relations: Often found alongside other Ravenfolk or avian creatures, potentially serving a larger faction or community.
environment: Typically inhabits forested or secluded areas, utilizing cover for stealthy operations.
strengths: Excels in Dexterity-based tasks and possesses high stealth and perception skills, making it difficult to detect.
weaknesses: Vulnerable in direct combat due to lower durability and limited offensive power.
attacks: Uses an array of attacks including the peck, rapier, and longbow, alongside unique abilities like Ghost Wings to blind enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Mimicry, allowing it to imitate sounds for tactical deception.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception score of 16, enhancing its ability to notice hidden dangers.
skills: Proficient in Stealth and Perception, enabling effective ambush tactics and environmental awareness.
additional_information: Can create phantasmal wings to blind nearby foes.
Has a decent Armor Class due to studded leather armor.
Good at ranged attacks with a longbow.
Uses environmental cover for stealth maneuvers.
Capable of mimicking humanoid voices for strategic deception.
test_queries: creature skilled in deception and perception
medium neutral humanoid with ghostly wings
ambush specialist with high stealth abilities
